DataElement.preferredDefinition: If the value for PEORRES is modified for coding purposes, then the modified text is placed here.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Data Element Physical Exam Modified Reported Term does not have Preferred Question Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Data Element Physical Exam Modified Reported Term does not have Preferred Question Text

ReferenceDocuments.name: PEMODIFY
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: This is not a data collection field that will appear on the CRF. Sponsors will populate this through the coding process. PEMODIFY contains any modified text used for coding. Used only when the reported abnormalities in PEORRES are coded to a dictionary. This is in contrast to Events and Interventions domains where the topic variable (TERM or TRT) is modified for coding.

DataElement.changeDescription: 2021-6-11 ak Released per governance approval. Created as part of the CDISC mapping task_ghd_08.27.18
